metadata.title: CVE-2015-5265 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The wiki component in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.10, 2.8.xbefore 2.8.8, and 2.9.x before 2.9.2 does not consider themod/wiki:managefiles capability before authorizing file management, whichallows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files by using amanage-files button in a text editor.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
